title: (x) accessories. a short story. - Joanna {Matthew B}
content:
Anyone know the face?

[http://faculty.acu.edu/~mmw03b/images/jcrew\_type.jpg](http://web.archive.org/)

 [‹ (x) Great Lengths swash capitals - Arabella {Mike Y}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071012143705/http:/typophile.com/node/19409 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) "Freia Chocolade Fabrik" early 20th century sans - similar to Titling Gothic {Geoff} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071012143705/http:/typophile.com/node/19401 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mike_wiggins

comments.content:
The link wasn’t working when I clicked it. So, here is another:

[http://faculty.acu.edu/~mmw03b/images/jcrew\_type.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071012143705/http:/faculty.acu.edu/~mmw03b/images/jcrew_type.jpg "http://faculty.acu.edu/~mmw03b/images/jcrew\_type.jpg")
That’s it! Thanks a bunch. I was just looking at Joanna a few weeks ago and admiring it. That’s probably why it caught my eye. Mr. Gill, what a guy.

Happy to help. I couldn’t get Gill’s Perpetua out of my head when looking at your sample. A google for “similar to Perpetua” led me to [this page](http://web.archive.org/web/20071012143705/http:/www.typophile.com/wiki/Eric%20Gill).
